name: TGEC PRESENTS: His Party
description:
You get invited to a party and when you try to leave, you find you can't. And each time you try to leave, the party gets stranger and stranger.

This is my fourth Twine game/IF and fifth for my Twine/Game-A-Month series. This one's another short one, and easily my most linear yet. But I had this dream about looping parties that get stranger and stranger and felt way too inspired to not make it.

Out of any of my projects, this one has the ending I'm most proud of. I just hope I set it up well enough.

Credit to my patrons for their continued support! James Gallagher and Rob Small, you boys are the best! If you wanna be my patron and support my projects, you can check out my Patreon at https://www.patreon.com/cameronhgamedev.

Part of the logo weren't by me so credit to the following:

  • Logo font credit to Jimmy Campbell. Source: https://www.dafont.com/early-gameboy.font
  • Rewind Icon made by Icomoon from www.flaticon.com 

Hope you enjoy!
